Bitcoin X

Blockchain hard fork is a complex process requires deep understanding of blockchain technical skills, computing power as well as ecosystem support. Bitpie will support all hard fork token if 1. Mainnet is online and stable 2. 2-way Replay protection is implemented3. Fair distribution and no private key import needed to claim.

Bitcoin X combines zero-knowledge proofs, smart contracts and will change to the DPOS consensus mechanism in the future.

Project name Bitcoin X(BCX)
Block height 498888
Hard-fork time 2017/12/12
Total supply 2100 Billion
Blocktime 2 min
Difficulty adjustment DAA
Block size 2M
Segwit Support
Unique address format Support
Consensus mechanism From POW to POS
Privacy protection zero-knowledge proof
Lightning Network Support
Smart contract Support
Official Website http://www.bcx.org
Project Team BitcoinX Foundation
